definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Three people were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus .
sentences.chinese: 3个人被从一辆面包车中发射的乱弹打死了。

sentences.english: He spoke into the phone, "How about the buses with the adults?"
sentences.chinese: 他对着电话筒讲到，“载有大人们的面包车呢？”

sentences.english: South of Tecate, California, the van broke down.
sentences.chinese: 在加利福尼亚州的特卡特南边，面包车抛锚了。

sentences.english: Offer various middle- and low-grade cars and microbuses for citizen to rent.
sentences.chinese: 我公司备有各种中低档轿车，面包车，可供市民租用。

sentences.english: Rural libraries operate from trucks, mini-vans, boats …
sentences.chinese: 郊区图书馆在卡车，面包车，船上。

sentences.english: Take the van to take the S-type winding road down to the port.
sentences.chinese: 坐上面包车走S型盘山公路下到口岸。

sentences.english: Torrijos stopped his van in front of our patio.
sentences.chinese: 托里霍斯让面包车在我们的平台前停下来。

sentences.english: And in minutes, a van will come to your house and pick you up.
sentences.chinese: 只需几分钟，一辆面包车就会开到你家来接你。

sentences.english: While crouching down trying to light a cigarette, a man drives by in a van.
sentences.chinese: 我低头点烟时，有人开着一辆面包车经过我身旁。

sentences.english: Mrs. Barker emerges and, Grandma announces the Young Man as the van man.
sentences.chinese: 巴克出现和夫人，奶奶宣布那青年男子的面包车。

sentences.english: Kim was already scrambling toward the car.
sentences.chinese: 金姆则已经向那辆面包车跑去。

sentences.english: " cackling sound", a hastily ordinary van parked in Guangzhou is attractive plaza.
sentences.chinese: “嘎”，一辆普通的面包车匆匆停在广州正佳广场。

sentences.english: The front of me was a microbus .
The van, recovered by police on Saturday, also contained explosives.
sentences.chinese: 这辆面包车随后被警方找到，里面还装着炸药。

sentences.english: Look at those yellow minis，the drivers are almost all the owners.
sentences.chinese: 你看那些黄的面包车，多数司机都是开自己的车。

sentences.english: A van and a lorry were parked there.
sentences.chinese: 旁边停着一辆面包车和一辆卡车。
